content.question: You will participate in a simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. You will have a conversation with Masao Hirano, a friend, about an upcoming party. Press record to begin each response to the conversation. Response 1

You will have a conversation with Masao Hirano, a friend, about an upcoming party. Press record to begin each response to the conversation. Response 1
